eshmun.expression.visitor.visitors

Class VariableListerVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.expression.visitor.VisitorAdapter
      • eshmun.expression.visitor.visitors.VariableListerVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitor

    public class VariableListerVisitor
extends VisitorAdapter
    This visitor lists the variables within an AndExpression, variables are listed in order and grouped by clause.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> clauseList
      List of CNF clauses, each clause is a term in the big AND operator.

      contains false if current clause is unsatisfiable.

    • Method Detail

      • listVariables

        public boolean listVariables(AbstractExpression exp)
                      throws NotCNFException
        Lists the variables, maps them to an ID, constructs the clauses as strings.
        Parameters:
        exp - the formula to visit.
        Returns:
        true if everything is legal, false if the given formula is unsatisfiable.
        Throws:
        NotCNFException - if the given formula is not in CNF format.

      • getClauseCount

        public int getClauseCount()
        Gets the number of clauses.
        Returns:
        the number of clauses.

      • getVariableCount

        public int getVariableCount()
        the number of distinct variables in this expression.
        Returns:
        the count of variables.

      • getCNFString

        public java.lang.String getCNFString()
        Gets the CNF formula in a string, formatted for sat solver.
        Returns:
        CNF formula in a String format.

      • getClauseList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getClauseList()
        Gets the clause list.
        Returns:
        a list of clauses.

      • getIDMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getIDMap()
        Gets the mapping from IDs to Variable Names.
        Returns:
        useful for deletion.

      • visit

        public void visit(AndOperator v)
        Visit an AndOperator. In valid CNF format, only one And is visited (the head).
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        v - the visited element.

        Specified by:

      • visit

        public void visit(NotOperator v)
        Visit a NotOperator. Marks the next variable as negated.
        Specified by:
        visit in interface Visitor
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        See Also:
        NotOperator

      • visit

        public void visit(BooleanVariable v)
        Visit a BooleanVariable. The variable is added to the current clause, and to the list (if it wasn't there).
        Specified by:
        visit in interface Visitor
        Overrides:
        visit in class VisitorAdapter
        Parameters:
        v - the visited element.
        See Also:
        BooleanVariable

      • visit

        public void visit(BooleanLiteral v)
        Visit a BooleanLiteral. Literals are not allowed by SatSolver, if the literal is a true in an or, it is replaced by a new free dummy variable. if the literal is a false in an and, this yields the formula unsatisfiable. otherwise the literal is ignored (literal is useless).
        Specified by:
        visit in interface Visitor
        Overrides:
        visit in class VisitorAdapter
        Parameters:
        v - the visited element.
        See Also:
        BooleanLiteral

      • childrenSeparator

        public void childrenSeparator()
        If this child is a child of the and operator, then the current clause is completed, and must be added to the list of clauses.

      • separator

        public void separator()
        Marks the exit of some Expression.
